channel.title: CVE Feed for Devolutions -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Devolutions -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4417|2024-10-04T16:50:38.460Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper access controls in the entry duplication component in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2023.2.19 and earlier versions on Windows allows an authenticated user, under specific circumstances, to inadvertently share their personal vault entry with shared vaults via an incorrect vault in the duplication write process.

item.title: CVE-2024-6512|2024-09-25T14:23:13.773Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: Authorization bypass in the PAM access request approval mechanism in Devolutions Server 2024.2.10 and earlier allows authenticated users with permissions to approve their own requests, bypassing intended security restrictions, via the PAM access request approval mechanism.

item.title: CVE-2024-4846|2024-08-01T20:55:09.986Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Authentication bypass in the 2FA feature in Devolutions Server 2024.1.14.0 and earlier allows an authenticated attacker to authenticate to another user without being asked for the 2FA via another browser tab.

item.title: CVE-2024-3545|2024-08-01T20:12:07.633Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper permission handling in the vault offline cache feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.1.20 and earlier on windows and Devolutions Server 2024.1.8 and earlier allows an attacker to access sensitive informations contained in the offline cache file by gaining access to a computer where the software is installed even though the offline mode is disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-6492|2024-07-16T18:16:36.780Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information in edge browser session proxy feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.2.14.0 and earlier on Windows allows an attacker to intercept proxy credentials via a specially crafted website.

item.title: CVE-2024-4846|2024-06-25T14:05:16.290Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Authentication bypass in the 2FA feature in Devolutions Server 2024.1.14.0 and earlier allows an authenticated attacker to authenticate to another user without being asked for the 2FA via another browser tab.

item.title: CVE-2024-6055|2024-06-18T14:58:12.472Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper removal of sensitive information in data source export feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.1.32.0 and earlier on Windows allows an attacker that obtains the exported settings to recover powershell credentials configured on the data source via stealing the configuration file.

item.title: CVE-2024-6055|2024-06-17T12:55:28.759Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper removal of sensitive information in data source export feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.1.32.0 and earlier on Windows allows an attacker that obtains the exported settings to recover powershell credentials configured on the data source via stealing the configuration file.

item.title: CVE-2024-2918|2024-04-09T18:42:44.643Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper input validation in PAM JIT elevation feature in Devolutions Server 2024.1.6 and earlier allows an attacker with access to the PAM JIT elevation feature to forge the displayed group in the PAM JIT elevation checkout request via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-3545|2024-06-04T17:31:25.717Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper permission handling in the vault offline cache feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.1.20 and earlier on windows and Devolutions Server 2024.1.8 and earlier allows an attacker to access sensitive informations contained in the offline cache file by gaining access to a computer where the software is installed even though the offline mode is disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-5072|2024-06-04T18:02:03.478Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper input validation in PAM JIT elevation feature in Devolutions Server 2024.1.11.0 and earlier allows an authenticated user with access to the PAM JIT elevation feature to manipulate the LDAP filter query via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-6057|2024-06-17T13:10:42.462Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper authentication in the vault password feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.1.31.0 and earlier allows an attacker that has compromised an access to an RDM instance to bypass the vault master password via the offline mode feature.

item.title: CVE-2024-4846|2024-06-25T12:18:18.180Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Authentication bypass in the 2FA feature in Devolutions Server 2024.1.14.0 and earlier allows an authenticated attacker to authenticate to another user without being asked for the 2FA via another browser tab.

item.title: CVE-2024-6354|2024-06-26T16:20:42.264Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper access control in PAM dashboard in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.2.11 and earlier on Windows allows an authenticated user to bypass the execute permission via the use of the PAM dashboard.

item.title: CVE-2024-2918|2024-07-16T19:36:12.877Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper input validation in PAM JIT elevation feature in Devolutions Server 2024.1.6 and earlier allows an attacker with access to the PAM JIT elevation feature to forge the displayed group in the PAM JIT elevation checkout request via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-6492|2024-07-16T19:02:33.619Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information in edge browser session proxy feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.2.14.0 and earlier on Windows allows an attacker to intercept proxy credentials via a specially crafted website.

item.title: CVE-2024-2918|2024-08-01T19:25:42.225Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper input validation in PAM JIT elevation feature in Devolutions Server 2024.1.6 and earlier allows an attacker with access to the PAM JIT elevation feature to forge the displayed group in the PAM JIT elevation checkout request via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-6055|2024-08-01T21:25:03.279Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper removal of sensitive information in data source export feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.1.32.0 and earlier on Windows allows an attacker that obtains the exported settings to recover powershell credentials configured on the data source via stealing the configuration file.

item.title: CVE-2024-6492|2024-08-01T21:41:03.459Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information in edge browser session proxy feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.2.14.0 and earlier on Windows allows an attacker to intercept proxy credentials via a specially crafted website.

item.title: CVE-2024-5072|2024-08-01T21:03:10.490Z -- devolutions -- server
item.description: Improper input validation in PAM JIT elevation feature in Devolutions Server 2024.1.11.0 and earlier allows an authenticated user with access to the PAM JIT elevation feature to manipulate the LDAP filter query via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-6057|2024-08-01T21:25:03.229Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper authentication in the vault password feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.1.31.0 and earlier allows an attacker that has compromised an access to an RDM instance to bypass the vault master password via the offline mode feature.

item.title: CVE-2024-6354|2024-08-01T21:33:05.392Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper access control in PAM dashboard in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.2.11 and earlier on Windows allows an authenticated user to bypass the execute permission via the use of the PAM dashboard.

item.title: CVE-2024-6057|2024-08-29T20:09:51.084Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: Improper authentication in the vault password feature in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.1.31.0 and earlier allows an attacker that has compromised an access to an RDM instance to bypass the vault master password via the offline mode feature.

item.title: CVE-2024-6512|2024-09-25T13:55:28.818Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: Authorization bypass in the PAM access request approval mechanism in Devolutions Server 2024.2.10 and earlier allows authenticated users with permissions to approve their own requests, bypassing intended security restrictions, via the PAM access request approval mechanism.

item.title: CVE-2024-7421|2024-09-25T15:36:09.369Z -- devolutions -- remote%20desktop%20manager
item.description: An information exposure in Devolutions Remote Desktop Manager 2024.2.20.0 and earlier on Windows allows local attackers with access to system logs to obtain session credentials via passwords included in command-line arguments when launching WinSCP sessions
